sentences.sContent: He called for a common European policy on immigration.
sentences.sCn: 他要求欧洲国家实施共同的移民政策。

sentences.sContent: ...Many current discussions of immigration issues talk about immigrants in general...
...Comprehensive immigration reform means doing everything all together in a rush...
...What is the author's view regarding America's immigration policy...
...What is the author's attitude towards "comprehensive immigration reform"...

...The very thought of formulating immigration laws from the standpoint of what is best for the American people seems to have been forgotten by many who focus on how to solve the problems of illegal immigration...
...It is hard to look for "the ideal outcome" on immigration in the abstract...
...Anything we try to do as regards immigration laws has to be done in the context of a huge welfare state that is already a major...
...Too much of our current immigration controversy is conducted in terms of abstract ideals...
...At the heart of the debate over illegal immigration lies one key question: are immigrants good or bad for the economy...
...immigration reduced the wages of American high-school dropouts by 9% between 1980-2000...
...the net effect of immigration is minimal...
...Public opinion polls show that people in most rich countries already think that immigration is too high...
...but as arguments about immigration hear up the campaign trail...

phrases.pCn: 移民身份；入境身份；在留资格

trans.tranOther: the process of entering another country in order to live there permanently
